name: Medieval castle defense
description:
Evil creatures attacked your castle and you have to defeat them. Use your bow and 10 magic spells to shoot down the monsters. Gain experience and upgrade your skills. Collect gold and buy upgrades for your hero!

Asset authors:

  1. Graphics: brullov, Jesse Munguia, rvros, LuizMelo, AstroBob, sanctumpixel
  2. Icons: cheekyinkling
  3. VFX: CodeManu, Stealthix
  4. UI: 0x72, wolf_viciox
  5. Music: SVL
"Dear friend! What I enjoy most is making games. The ability to create living virtual worlds is incomparable to anything else. But the reality is that my real world is being destroyed. I live in Ukraine. I thank everyone who helps our country. Any help and support from you is invaluable! Thank you!"
